line.comment: * Assignments is a table of arrays, of which each key is a name of a worker.
* [0]: An array of ships. The default size is the max. number of ships that can be assigned to this role.
* [1]: An array of ship classes that are allowed to be assigned.
* [2]: The name of the script that runs the worker.
* $classes is sorted by priority, the LAST index being the most important one.

sval.val: Assignments is a table of arrays, of which each key is a name of a worker.
[0]: An array of ships. The default size is the max. number of ships that can be assigned to this role.
[1]: An array of ship classes that are allowed to be assigned.
[2]: The name of the script that runs the worker.
$classes is sorted by priority, the LAST index being the most important one.
